title: Spotlight Rules
description: Configuration for Spotlight implicit dependency rules

implicitRules.description: A set of rules for inferring implicit project dependencies

implicitDependencyRule.description: A rule for adding implicit dependencies based on build script content or project path

buildscriptMatchRule.title: Buildscript Match Rule
buildscriptMatchRule.description: Adds implicit dependencies when a regex pattern matches any line in a project's build script

pattern.description: A regex pattern to match against build script contents

projectPathMatchRule.title: Project Path Match Rule
projectPathMatchRule.description: Adds implicit dependencies when a project's Gradle path matches the regex pattern

pattern.description: A regex pattern to match against project paths

buildscriptCaptureRule.title: Buildscript Capture Rule
buildscriptCaptureRule.description: Extracts project paths from build scripts using regex capture groups and a template

pattern.description: A regex pattern with capture groups to match against build script contents

projectTemplate.description: A template string where $1, $2, etc. are replaced with captured groups

projectPathArray.description: An array of Gradle project paths
